Package com.IGallinari.LastGame.repository

Interface GameRepository

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Game,Integer>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Game,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListCrudRepository<Game,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListPagingAndSortingRepository<Game,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<Game,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<Game>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<Game,Integer>
@Repository public interface GameRepository extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Game,Integer>
This interface represents the repository for managing Game entities. It extends the JpaRepository interface provided by Spring Data JPA.

    • findDistinctYears

      @Query(value="SELECT YEAR(date) FROM game GROUP BY YEAR(date)", nativeQuery=true) List<Integer> findDistinctYears()
      Retrieves a list of distinct years for which there are games in the database.
      Returns:
      List of distinct years.

    • findAllGameIdsBeforeDateNotCompleted

      @Query(value="SELECT id FROM game g WHERE (g.id NOT IN (SELECT sp.idGame FROM statsplayer sp) OR g.id NOT IN (SELECT sg.idGame FROM statsgame sg)) and g.date<:inputDate ORDER BY g.date DESC; ", nativeQuery=true) List<Integer> findAllGameIdsBeforeDateNotCompleted(@Param("inputDate") LocalDate date)
      Retrieves a list of game IDs that occurred before a specified date and are not completed (stats not available).
      Parameters:
      date - The date to compare against.
      Returns:
      List of game IDs that occurred before the specified date and are not completed in statsplayer or statsgames.

    • findGameByDate

      List<Game> findGameByDate(LocalDate inputDate)
      Retrieves a list of Games objects for a specified date.
      Parameters:
      inputDate - The date for which to retrieve games.
      Returns:
      List of Games objects for the specified date.

    • findLastFourGameByTeam

      @Query(value="SELECT * FROM game g WHERE (g.idVisitor=:inputIdTeam OR g.idHome=:inputIdTeam) AND g.id IN (SELECT sg.idGame FROM statsgame sg GROUP BY sg.idGame) AND g.date<:inputDate ORDER BY g.date DESC LIMIT 4", nativeQuery=true) List<Game> findLastFourGameByTeam(@Param("inputIdTeam") int idTeam, @Param("inputDate") LocalDate date)
      Retrieves the last four Games objects involving a specific team before a specified date.
      Parameters:
      idTeam - The ID of the team for which to retrieve games.
      date - The date to compare against.
      Returns:
      List of the last four Games objects involving the specified team before the specified date.

    • findIdTeam

      @Query(value="SELECT g.idHome AS idTeam FROM game g WHERE g.id =:idGame UNION SELECT g.idVisitor AS idTeam FROM game g WHERE g.id=:idGame ", nativeQuery=true) List<Integer> findIdTeam(@Param("idGame") int idGame)
      Retrieves a list of teams IDs of a specific game.
      Parameters:
      idGame - The ID of the game for which to retrieve team.
      Returns:
      List of IDs teams involving the specified game.

    • findLastFourHtH

      @Query(value="SELECT * FROM game g WHERE ((g.idVisitor=:idTeamHome AND g.idHome=:idTeamVisitor) OR (g.idVisitor=:idTeamVisitor AND g.idHome=:idTeamHome)) AND g.id IN (SELECT sg.idGame FROM statsgame sg GROUP BY sg.idGame) AND g.date<:inputDate ORDER BY g.date DESC LIMIT 4;", nativeQuery=true) List<Game> findLastFourHtH(@Param("idTeamHome") int idTeamHome, @Param("idTeamVisitor") int idTeamVisitor, @Param("inputDate") LocalDate date)
      Returns the last four head-to-head Games objects between two teams, given their IDs and a date.
      Parameters:
      idTeamHome - ID of the home team
      idTeamVisitor - ID of the visiting team
      date - the date to search for
      Returns:
      a list of the last four head-to-head games between the two teams

    • findNextGameByIdTeam

      @Query(value="SELECT * FROM game g WHERE (g.idVisitor=:inputIdTeam OR g.idHome=:inputIdTeam) AND g.status<3 ORDER BY g.date DESC LIMIT 1", nativeQuery=true) Game findNextGameByIdTeam(@Param("inputIdTeam") int idTeam)
      Returns the next Game object for a given team ID.
      Parameters:
      idTeam - the ID of the team
      Returns:
      the next Game object for the given team ID

    • findPastGameByIdTeam

      @Query(value="SELECT * FROM game g WHERE (g.idVisitor=:inputIdTeam OR g.idHome=:inputIdTeam) AND g.status=3 ORDER BY g.date ASC LIMIT 1", nativeQuery=true) Game findPastGameByIdTeam(@Param("inputIdTeam") int idTeam)
      Returns the most recent past game for a given team ID.
      Parameters:
      idTeam - the ID of the team
      Returns:
      the most recent past game for the given team ID

    • findCurrentSeason

      @Query(value="SELECT g.season FROM game g WHERE g.status=3 ORDER BY g.date DESC LIMIT 1", nativeQuery=true) Integer findCurrentSeason()
      Returns the current season.
      Returns:
      the current season
